sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' ; import '../styles/tour-details.css' import { Container,Row,Col,Form,ListGroup} from 'reactstrap'; import {useParams} from 'react-router-dom'; import tourData from '../assets/data/tours'; import calculateAvgRating from '../utils/avgRating'; import avatar from '../assets/images/avatar.jpg' const TourDetails = () => { const {id} = useParams(); const tour=tourData.find(tour=> tour.id ===id) const {photo,title,desc,price,address,reviews,city,distance,maxGroupSize}=tour; const {totalRating,avgRating}=calculateAvgRating(reviews); const options={day:'numeric',month:'long',year:'numeric'}; return <>

{title}

{calculateAvgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating} {totalRating===0 ? 'Not Rated' : ({reviews?.length})} {address}
{city} {price}/per person {maxGroupSize}
Description

{desc}

{/* Tour Reviews section start */}

Reviews ({reviews?.length}reviews)

1 2 3 4 5
{ reviews?.map(review=>(
Bharanidharan

{new Date('02-29-2024').toLocaleDateString('en-US',options)}

5
Amazing tour
)) }
{/* Tour Reviews section end */}
}; export default TourDetails;
